metadata.title: Making the Cut Season 3 Episode 1 Ruffle Long Sleeve Blouse Inspired by Sienna's Winning Look
features: Made of a medium-weight, cotton sateen with stretch
Models are 5'10"/178 cm and wearing a size S and XXL
This top size S is 20"/51cm long; size XXL is 22"/56cm long
Regular-Fit: designed to follow the body - neither loose nor clingy
Hook and eye front, tie closure
description: Hosted by Heidi Klum and Tim Gunn, Season 3 of Making the Cut brings together 10 talented, up and coming designers. Each week the contestants compete in design challenges that test both their design skills and their ability to run a fashion brand. Episode 1 Winning Designer Sienna Li, born and raised in China, is a full-time fashion designer based in New York City. Li launched her namesake high-end women's wear brand in 2015. Sienna is best known for her romantic silhouettes and imaginative designs. The Ruffle Long Sleeve Blouse is apart of Siennaâ€™s capsule collection inspired by the Ruffle High-Low Dress.

title: Making the Cut Season 3 Episode 1 Ruffle Long Sleeve Blouse Inspired by Sienna's Winning Look
